s# resources.txt
# Format: name | description | link

# Extracted unique root URLs from link-list.txt
# (Only the protocol and domain, nothing after the first /)

Mobilize | Platform to find and join events, petitions, and volunteer opportunities for progressive causes and organizations. | https://www.mobilize.us

Heading: Immigrant Support
ACLU of Massachusetts | Defending equality, liberty, and justice. Protects civil liberties and advances equity for all in Massachusetts through advocacy, litigation, and public education. | https://www.aclum.org
Boston Immigration Justice Accompaniment Network (BIJAN) & Beyond Bond and Legal Defense Fund | Community network supporting immigrants through accompaniment, legal referrals, and bond fundraising in Massachusetts and Rhode Island. | https://www.beyondbondboston.org
Lawyers for Civil Rights | Works with people of color, immigrants, and low-income communities to fight discrimination and pursue justice through legal advocacy, education, and empowerment. | https://lawyersforcivilrights.org
LUCE Immigrant Justice Network of MA | Coalition of immigrant-led, grassroots organizations building people power for immigrant justice in Massachusetts, operating a multilingual ICE defense hotline. | https://www.lucemass.org
Massachusetts Immigrant & Refugee Advocacy Coalition | Advocates for the rights and integration of immigrants and refugees in Massachusetts through policy, education, and support services. | https://miracoalition.org
Welcome Immigrant Network | Empowering immigrant communities through orientation, advocacy, and support to foster civic, cultural, and economic engagement. | https://www.welcomeimmigrantnetwork.org

Heading: Elections
State + Local Election Alliance (SLEA) | Organization focused on winning state and local elections to secure, maintain, and advance democracy by investing in non-federal races and election administration. | https://www.state-elections.org
Swing Blue Alliance | Community organizing and volunteer opportunities to support democracy and progressive candidates. | https://swingbluealliance.org
Cook Political House Ratings | Independent, non-partisan newsletter analyzing U.S. elections, campaigns, and political trends. | https://www.cookpolitical.com
Progressive Massachusetts Legislator Scorecard | Tracks legislation and provides report cards for Massachusetts legislators to help citizens enact positive local change. | https://scorecard.progressivemass.com

Heading: Indivisible MA Coalition - A Grassroots organizations united for democracy and social justice in Massachusetts.
 
Indivisible Massachusetts Coalition | Connects people to action-oriented groups to defend rights, freedoms, and democracy in Massachusetts. | https://indivisible-ma.org
Turn Purple 2 Blue | Grassroots organization focused on promoting progressive candidates and defending democracy in Massachusetts. | https://turnpurple2blue.org
Concord Indivisible | Locally-led grassroots organization in Concord, and beyond, building progressive power and defending democracy
Indivisible LAB | Locally-led grassroots organization in Lexington, Arlington, Bedford, and beyond, building progressive power and defending democracy through direct action and community engagement. | https://www.indivisiblelab.org
Indivisible Massachusetts Coalition | Connects people to action-oriented groups to defend rights, freedoms, and democracy in Massachusetts. | https://indivisible-ma.org

Heading: Protests at 1000 District Ave and Hanscom
